program main

    implicit none

    integer*8 :: a, result
    
    integer :: bInt, new_length, i 

    ! Allocate a character array for the new string. Max input length?

    character(len=255) :: b

    character(len=1), dimension(255) :: new_chars ! Needs to be as big as maximum possible length of b (without '.' )

    new_length =0 

    ! read the inputs

    read(*,*) a, b

    ! process the string b to remove '.' 

    do i=1, len_trim(b)
        if (b(i:i) /= '.') then
            new_length = new_length+1
            new_chars(new_length) = b(i:i)
        end if
    end do

    ! Now, read the new_chars as integer

    read(new_chars(1:new_length), *) bInt 

    ! calculate the result

    result = ( a * bInt ) / 100

    ! print the result

    print*, result

end program main
